inlineContent.text: The completion handler for passing the
is required and must not be
The caller is responsible for keeping the argument object valid for the duration of the completion handler invocation.

The caller can implement this optional protocol method to set up custom policies for peer certificate trust evaluation. If the delegate method is implemented, the caller is responsible for creating and setting up the
object and passing it to the completion handler. Otherwise, the default trust evaluation policy is used for the connection.

abstract.text: Secure the data your app manages, and control access to your app.
An object used to evaluate trust.
Evaluates trust for the specified certificate and policies.
Customize and extend core networking features.
An object to manage a TCP connection, with or without TLS.
A delegate protocol to customize the TLS authentication done by a connection.
Override the default trust evaluation for the connection.
Provide the identity and an optional certificate chain to be used for authentication.
Indicate that the delegate should override the default trust evaluation for the connection.
Indicate that the delegate can provide an identity for the connection authentication.
An object used to evaluate trust.
The return type of functions that donâ€™t explicitly specify a return type, that is, an empty tuple `()`.
